name: Little Stitches
description:
Its getting cold out and you want to make a lovely quilt for Grandma, but so does that other ladybug. Maybe if you make most of the quilt, she’ll love you more! The more patches of fabric you get, and the more stitches you make, the more of the quilt you will have made. Let’s show them who grandma’s favorite ladybug is!

Little Stitches is a two player turn-based strategy game where both players control the same character. You have to work with and against your opponent to move around, place stitches and claim fabric patches as your own. Claim as many patches and stitch as many threads as you can to get a higher score and win! 

Soft Potato Squad from Cleveland Institute of Art and Case Western Reserve University Game Media Production I & III classes present Little Stitches.
